text: On a regular October day, you offered me that pink shirt above; at first it didnt mean to me. Though after wearing it, it did leave a great memory(Bying it).
Fish have always been one of the things that unite us; known in your family as 'Tabaa el samak' -eh ya ay. Eager to go with you fishing one day, soon!
Whenever i feel my spirit to the gound or lose hope, my refuge remains you aahra, who always lift me up and draw that smile on my face.(play it)
